name: proxmoxve
description: A Pulumi package for creating and managing Proxmox Virtual Environment cloud resources.
attribution: This Pulumi package is based on the [`proxmoxve` Terraform Provider](https://github.com/bpg/terraform-provider-proxmoxve).

nodejs.packageDescription: A Pulumi package for creating and managing Proxmox Virtual Environment cloud resources.
nodejs.readme:
> This provider is a derived work of the [Terraform Provider](https://github.com/bpg/terraform-provider-proxmoxve)
> distributed under [MPL 2.0](https://www.mozilla.org/en-US/MPL/2.0/). If you encounter a bug or missing feature,
> first check the [`pulumi-proxmoxve` repo](https://github.com/muhlba91/pulumi-proxmoxve/issues); however, if that doesn't turn up anything,
> please consult the source [`terraform-provider-proxmoxve` repo](https://github.com/bpg/terraform-provider-proxmoxve/issues).

> This provider is a derived work of the [Terraform Provider](https://github.com/bpg/terraform-provider-proxmoxve)
> distributed under [MPL 2.0](https://www.mozilla.org/en-US/MPL/2.0/). If you encounter a bug or missing feature,
> first check the [`pulumi-proxmoxve` repo](https://github.com/muhlba91/pulumi-proxmoxve/issues); however, if that doesn't turn up anything,
> please consult the source [`terraform-provider-proxmoxve` repo](https://github.com/bpg/terraform-provider-proxmoxve/issues).

provider.description:
The provider type for the proxmoxve package. By default, resources use package-wide configuration
settings, however an explicit `Provider` instance may be created and passed during resource
construction to achieve fine-grained programmatic control over provider settings. See the
[documentation](https://www.pulumi.com/docs/reference/programming-model/#providers) for more information.

poolId.description: The ID of the pool to assign the container to

tags.description: Tags of the container. This is only meta information.

unprivileged.description: Whether the container runs as unprivileged on the host

hostpcis.description: The Host PCI devices mapped to the VM

ipv4Addresses.description: The IPv4 addresses published by the QEMU agent

ipv6Addresses.description: The IPv6 addresses published by the QEMU agent
